attributes.action: Stop taxing us then giving our money away for foreign aid to other countries!
attributes.additional_details: Instead of taking our money then giving it away to other countries, try reducing our taxes and spending that money here, in the UK, on roads, hospitals etc. and instead of increasing taxes, why not first cut down on expenses for MP’s. Reduce the expenses will certainly help to start reducing the costs of outgoings.
attributes.background: We want the government to stop taxing us then giving our money away without our permission to foreign countries, such as support packages for Syria, Ukraine, and other countries. This is tax money unfairly taken from us then given away without our permission with no direct benifit to UK taxpayers.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700263
